step.title: Adding the electronics and management system to the module

paragraph.htmltext:
Electronics and management system are added to the pack to be able to monitor the pack when it is used in an application.

Electrocution and external short circuit stay the main risks during this step. To avoid these risk the necessary measures need to be taken:

  • Covering current connector
  • Use of high voltage tools
  • Use of high voltage gloves

To avoid the start of a thermal runaway, electrical and mechanical abuse shall always be avoided during the assembling process. The temperature need to be checked on a regular base.

The connectors to connect the pack with other systems are also placed in this step. These can be data or power connectors.
